trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Morristown
There were no other sightings in Morristown on or around April 30th 1997
divs: Sighting Detailswalking home from a pick-up football game,as i got half way there,i had a strange feeling,like something was behind me,i instictivly turned and looked up.there over my head was a fire ball,my 1st thought was a meteor,but it was too close to the ground,then it flew off into the horizon.i cant say if it was hovering over me,or moving very slow,but when i turned,it took less tha 5 seconds to be out of sight towards the sunset.
Summary: fire ball coming from east towards the west
